title: Posture Corrector for Women Men Back Brace Straightener Upper Back straight Support Trainer Correction For Upper and Lower Back, Adjustable and Breathable Posture Corrector for Neck and Back Pain Relief (2X-Large(45-50 Inch))
features: 😄【IMPROVE POSTURE】 Tighten your muscles and support your back, stay away from the hump. Give you a healthy posture, straight back and healthy look again! Improve confidence! 😄【COMFORTABLE AND BREATHABLE MATERIAL】 The Posture Corrector is made with breathable, strong, and high-quality materials，for long-lasting back support. So that you can wear it under your coat. It takes only 1-2 hours to wear every day to have a straight back 😄【EASY TO WEAR & USE】Just need wear according to the tutorial: 1.put the shoulder straps through the buckle, adjust the straps positions. 2.put it one the shoulder like a backpack, one shoulder and the other. 3.pull the shoulder straps to adjust until correct posture. 4.enjoy your right posture 😄【Four times support & Ergonomics】This back posterior brace can effectively relieve back pain, and it is also good for waist and neck,More effective support can promote body muscle memory，more straight 😄【Highly Adjustable】 High quality structure gives you more perfect support. You can choose which size you want for yourself! S size is 24"-30", M size is 30"-35",L size is 35"-39",XL size is 39"-45", XXL size is 45"-50"
